intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to CueHire Documentation! CueHire is a modern recruitment and hiring platform designed to streamline the interview and hiring process.

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/installation.title: Installation Guide
tutorial-basics/installation.description: This guide will help you set up CueHire on your local machine for development.

tutorial-basics/interviews.title: Interview Management
tutorial-basics/interviews.description: CueHire provides a comprehensive interview management system to streamline the interview process from scheduling to feedback collection.

tutorial-basics/jobs.title: Job Management
tutorial-basics/jobs.description: CueHire provides a comprehensive job management system to streamline the hiring process from job posting to candidate selection.

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-basics/organization.title: Organization Management
tutorial-basics/organization.description: CueHire provides comprehensive organization management features to help companies structure their hiring process.
